auctions.title: Vintage Camera Collection
auctions.description: A rare collection of vintage cameras from the 1960s including Leica M3, Canon AE-1, and Nikon F2. All in excellent working condition with original leather cases.

auctions.title: Rare Baseball Cards
auctions.description: Complete set of 1989 Upper Deck baseball cards including Ken Griffey Jr. rookie card. All cards are in mint condition and professionally graded.

auctions.title: Gaming Laptop RTX 4090
auctions.description: High-end gaming laptop with RTX 4090 GPU, Intel i9-13900HX, 32GB RAM, 2TB NVMe SSD. Perfect for gaming and content creation. Like new condition.

auctions.title: Abstract Oil Painting
auctions.description: Original abstract oil painting by emerging artist. Size: 36x48 inches. Signed and dated. Comes with certificate of authenticity.

auctions.title: Designer Watch Collection
auctions.description: Luxury watch collection including Rolex Submariner, Omega Seamaster, and Tag Heuer Carrera. All authentic with original boxes and papers.

auctions.title: Antique Furniture Set
auctions.description: Victorian-era furniture set including dining table, 6 chairs, and sideboard. Mahogany wood with intricate carvings. Professionally restored.

auctions.title: Vintage Vinyl Record Collection
auctions.description: Over 200 classic vinyl records from the 60s-80s including The Beatles, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin. All in very good to excellent condition.

auctions.title: Professional Camera Drone
auctions.description: DJI Mavic 3 Pro with 4K camera, multiple batteries, carrying case, and ND filters. Less than 10 hours of flight time.

auctions.title: Signed First Edition Books
auctions.description: Collection of signed first edition books including works by Stephen King, J.K. Rowling, and Neil Gaiman. All in pristine condition.

auctions.title: Classic Arcade Machine
auctions.description: Restored 1980s Pac-Man arcade machine. Fully functional with original cabinet art. Perfect for game rooms or collectors.
